alert.note: Alert for Bolivar; Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:50PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sunflower and eastern Bolivar Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 349 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Shelby, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mound Bayou around 400 PM CDT. Renova around 415 PM CDT. Cleveland and Boyle around 430 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Winstonville, Pace, Duncan and Merigold. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northwestern Mississippi.
